choicegroup.label: Do you expect the bottom chord/member of a truss (shown in green) to be in tension, compression, or both tension and compression due to downward loads as shown by the black arrows?

div.p: The bottom chord of the truss will be in tension since as it deforms the bottom stretches or elongates.
